languages.text: "Отнюдь. Согласно хроникам Дома, я родилась на одном из миров Орселлио. Вирт... Иртви... О, как же..." {n}Кассия растерянно потирает висок.{/n} "Прошу меня простить, Лорд-капитан, воспоминания о детстве слишком расплывчаты. Иногда во сне я вижу пестрых птиц, что гнездились в саду. Или слуг в пурпурных ливреях. Или синий туман, что стелился над низиной за нашим дворцом... Но все подернуто розовой дымкой — быть может, эти картины рисует мое воображение, а не истинная память".

traits.locale_text: "Отнюдь. Согласно хроникам Дома, я родилась на одном из миров Орселлио. Вирт... Иртви... О, как же..." {n}Кассия растерянно потирает висок.{/n} "Прошу меня простить, Лорд-капитан, воспоминания о детстве слишком расплывчаты. Иногда во сне я вижу пестрых птиц, что гнездились в саду. Или слуг в пурпурных ливреях. Или синий туман, что стелился над низиной за нашим дворцом... Но все подернуто розовой дымкой — быть может, эти картины рисует мое воображение, а не истинная память".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hardly. According to the chronicles of the House, I was born on one of the Orsellio worlds. Virt... Irtvi... Oh, what was it..." {n}Cassia absent-mindedly rubs her temple.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain, my childhood memories are too vague. Sometimes I dream about the colourful birds that built their nests in the garden. Or the servants dressed in purple livery. Or the blue fog that rolled over the lowlands behind the palace... But everything is covered in a rosy haze. Perhaps it is my imagination, not my memory, that is painting these pictures."
languages.original_text: "Отнюдь. Согласно хроникам Дома, я родилась на одном из миров Орселлио. Вирт... Иртви... О, как же..." {n}Кассия растерянно потирает висок.{/n} "Прошу меня простить, Лорд-капитан, воспоминания о детстве слишком расплывчаты. Иногда во сне я вижу пестрых птиц, что гнездились в саду. Или слуг в пурпурных ливреях. Или синий туман, что стелился над низиной за нашим дворцом... Но все подернуто розовой дымкой — быть может, эти картины рисует мое воображение, а не истинная память".

traits.locale_text: "Hardly. According to the chronicles of the House, I was born on one of the Orsellio worlds. Virt... Irtvi... Oh, what was it..." {n}Cassia absent-mindedly rubs her temple.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain, my childhood memories are too vague. Sometimes I dream about bright and colorful birds that built their nests in the garden. Or the servants in purple livery. Or the blue fog streaming above the lowlands behind the palace... And yet everything is covered in rosy haze — perhaps it is my imagination that is painting these pictures and not the true memory."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “几乎没去过。根据家族的编年史，我出生在奥赛罗家族麾下的某个世界，叫做维特……伊利维……噢，是叫什么来着……”{n}卡西娅心不在焉地揉着太阳穴。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人，我童年的记忆实在是太模糊了。有的时候，我会梦见那些在花园里筑巢的彩色鸟儿，或是穿着紫色制服的仆人，又或是蓝色的雾气，在宫殿后面的洼地中翻腾着……但这一切都笼罩在玫瑰色的雾霭中。或许这些情景并不是我的记忆，仅仅是我的想象而已。”
languages.original_text: "Hardly. According to the chronicles of the House, I was born on one of the Orsellio worlds. Virt... Irtvi... Oh, what was it..." {n}Cassia absent-mindedly rubs her temple.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain, my childhood memories are too vague. Sometimes I dream about the colourful birds that built their nests in the garden. Or the servants dressed in purple livery. Or the blue fog that rolled over the lowlands behind the palace... But everything is covered in a rosy haze. Perhaps it is my imagination, not my memory, that is painting these pictures."

traits.locale_text: “几乎没去过。根据家族的编年史，我出生在奥塞罗家族麾下的某个世界，叫做维特……伊利维……噢，是叫什么来着……”{n}卡西娅心不在焉地揉着太阳穴。{/n}“请原谅，舰长大人，我童年的记忆实在是太模糊了。有的时候，我会梦见那些在花园里筑巢的彩色鸟儿，或是穿着紫色制服的仆人，又或是蓝色的雾气，在宫殿后面的洼地中翻腾着……但这一切都笼罩在玫瑰色的雾霭中。或许这些情景并不是我的记忆，仅仅是我的想象而已。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Hardly. According to the chronicles of the House, I was born on one of the Orsellio worlds. Virt... Irtvi... Oh, what was it..." {n}Cassia absent-mindedly rubs her temple.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain, my childhood memories are too vague. Sometimes I dream about the colourful birds that built their nests in the garden. Or the servants dressed in purple livery. Or the blue fog that rolled over the lowlands behind the palace... But everything is covered in a rosy haze. Perhaps it is my imagination, not my memory, that is painting these pictures."

languages.text: «En absoluto. Según las crónicas de la casa, nací en uno de los mundos de los Orsellio.Virt... Irtvi... ¿Cómo se llamaba...?». {n}Cassia se frota la sien, distraída.{/n} «Le ruego que me disculpe, Lord Capitán, pero los recuerdos de mi infancia son vagos. A veces sueño con los pájaros coloridos que anidaban en el jardín, o con los sirvientes, vestidos con sus uniformes morados. O con la niebla azul que cubría las tierras bajas junto al palacio... pero todo está envuelto en una niebla rosada. Tal vez sea mi imaginación y no mi memoria la que pinta estas imágenes».
languages.original_text: "Hardly. According to the chronicles of the House, I was born on one of the Orsellio worlds. Virt... Irtvi... Oh, what was it..." {n}Cassia absent-mindedly rubs her temple.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain, my childhood memories are too vague. Sometimes I dream about the colourful birds that built their nests in the garden. Or the servants dressed in purple livery. Or the blue fog that rolled over the lowlands behind the palace... But everything is covered in a rosy haze. Perhaps it is my imagination, not my memory, that is painting these pictures."

traits.locale_text: «En absoluto. Según las crónicas de la casa, nací en uno de los mundos de los Orsellio.Virt... Irtvi... ¿Cómo se llamaba...?». {n}Cassia se frota la sien, distraída.{/n} «Le ruego que me disculpe, Lord Capitán, pero los recuerdos de mi infancia son vagos. A veces sueño con los pájaros coloridos que anidaban en el jardín, o con los sirvientes, vestidos con sus uniformes morados. O con la niebla azul que cubría las tierras bajas junto al palacio... pero todo está envuelto en una niebla rosada. Tal vez sea mi imaginación y no mi memoria la que pinta estas imágenes».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ほとんどありません。一族の年代記によれば、私はオーセリオの惑星のひとつで生まれました。ヴァート…イルトヴィ…ああ、なんでしたか…」{n}カシアは上の空でこめかみをさする。{/n}「お許しください、ロード・キャプテン。私の幼少期の記憶はあまりにも曖昧なのです。時々、庭に巣を作った色とりどりの鳥の夢を見るんです。紫色の服を着た使用人たち。宮殿裏の低地に立ち込める青い霧…しかし、すべてがバラ色の靄に覆われています。おそらく、このイメージを描いているのは私の記憶ではなく、想像力なのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Hardly. According to the chronicles of the House, I was born on one of the Orsellio worlds. Virt... Irtvi... Oh, what was it..." {n}Cassia absent-mindedly rubs her temple.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain, my childhood memories are too vague. Sometimes I dream about the colourful birds that built their nests in the garden. Or the servants dressed in purple livery. Or the blue fog that rolled over the lowlands behind the palace... But everything is covered in a rosy haze. Perhaps it is my imagination, not my memory, that is painting these pictures."

traits.locale_text: 「ほとんどありません。一族の年代記によれば、私はオーセリオの惑星のひとつで生まれました。ヴァート…イルトヴィ…ああ、なんでしたか…」{n}カシアは上の空でこめかみをさする。{/n}「お許しください、ロード・キャプテン。私の幼少期の記憶はあまりにも曖昧なのです。時々、庭に巣を作った色とりどりの鳥の夢を見るんです。紫色の服を着た使用人たち。宮殿裏の低地に立ち込める青い霧…しかし、すべてがバラ色の靄に覆われています。おそらく、このイメージを描いているのは私の記憶ではなく、想像力なのでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wohl kaum. Den Chroniken des Hauses nach wurde ich auf einer der Orsellio-Welten geboren. Virt ... Irtvi ... Ach, wie hieß sie doch gleich ..." {n}Cassia reibt sich gedankenverloren die Schläfe.{/n} "Bitte vergebt mir, Lord Captain, meine Kindheitserinnerungen sind zu vage. Manchmal träume ich von den bunten Vögeln, die im Garten ihre Nester gebaut haben. Oder von den Dienern in ihrer purpurnen Livree. Oder von dem blauen Nebel, der über das Flachland hinter dem Palast gezogen ist ... Aber alles ist mit einem rosafarbenen Schleier bedeckt. Vielleicht ist es meine Fantasie, die diese Bilder malt, nicht meine Erinnerung."
languages.original_text: "Hardly. According to the chronicles of the House, I was born on one of the Orsellio worlds. Virt... Irtvi... Oh, what was it..." {n}Cassia absent-mindedly rubs her temple.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain, my childhood memories are too vague. Sometimes I dream about the colourful birds that built their nests in the garden. Or the servants dressed in purple livery. Or the blue fog that rolled over the lowlands behind the palace... But everything is covered in a rosy haze. Perhaps it is my imagination, not my memory, that is painting these pictures."

traits.locale_text: "Wohl kaum. Den Chroniken des Hauses nach wurde ich auf einer der Orsellio-Welten geboren. Virt ... Irtvi ... Ach, wie hieß sie doch gleich ..." {n}Cassia reibt sich gedankenverloren die Schläfe.{/n} "Bitte vergebt mir, Lord Captain, meine Kindheitserinnerungen sind zu vage. Manchmal träume ich von den bunten Vögeln, die im Garten ihre Nester gebaut haben. Oder von den Dienern in ihrer purpurnen Livree. Oder von dem blauen Nebel, der über das Flachland hinter dem Palast gezogen ist ... Aber alles ist mit einem rosafarbenen Schleier bedeckt. Vielleicht ist es meine Fantasie, die diese Bilder malt, nicht meine Erinnerung."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « À peu de choses près, oui. D'après les chroniques de ma maison, je suis née sur l'un des mondes Orsellio. Virt... Irtvi... Oh, comment s'appelait-il, déjà... {n}s'interroge Cassia en se frottant les tempes d'un air absent.{/n} Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mes souvenirs d'enfance sont trop vagues. Parfois, je rêve des oiseaux colorés qui faisaient leurs nids dans le jardin, des livrées pourpres des serviteurs ou de la brume bleue recouvrant la plaine qui s'étendait à l'arrière du palais... mais c'est comme si tout était voilé par dans un brouillard rosé. Je serais bien incapable de dire si ces images sont de véritables souvenirs ou le produit de mon imagination. »
languages.original_text: "Hardly. According to the chronicles of the House, I was born on one of the Orsellio worlds. Virt... Irtvi... Oh, what was it..." {n}Cassia absent-mindedly rubs her temple.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain, my childhood memories are too vague. Sometimes I dream about the colourful birds that built their nests in the garden. Or the servants dressed in purple livery. Or the blue fog that rolled over the lowlands behind the palace... But everything is covered in a rosy haze. Perhaps it is my imagination, not my memory, that is painting these pictures."

traits.locale_text: « À peu de choses près, oui. D'après les chroniques de ma maison, je suis née sur l'un des mondes Orsellio. Virt... Irtvi... Oh, comment s'appelait-il, déjà... {n}s'interroge Cassia en se frottant les tempes d'un air absent.{/n} Pardonnez-moi, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mes souvenirs d'enfance sont trop vagues. Parfois, je rêve des oiseaux colorés qui faisaient leurs nids dans le jardin, des livrées pourpres des serviteurs ou de la brume bleue recouvrant la plaine qui s'étendait à l'arrière du palais... mais c'est comme si tout était voilé par dans un brouillard rosé. Je serais bien incapable de dire si ces images sont de véritables souvenirs ou le produit de mon imagination. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Pek sayılmaz. Hane vakayinamelerinde anlatılanlara göre Orsellio dünyalarından birinde doğmuşum. Dünyanın adı Virt mi, Irtvi mi neydi..." {n}Cassia dalgın dalgın şakaklarını ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Lütfen kusura bakma Lord Kaptan, çocukluğuma dair anılarım pek net değil. Bazen rüyalarımda bahçemize yuva yapmış rengârenk kuşları, mor üniformalara bürünmüş hizmetkârları veya sarayın ardındaki ovaları kaplayan masmavi sisi görüyorum... Ama her şey pembe bir pusla kaplı. Belki de o kareleri renklendiren hafızam değil de hayal gücümdür."
languages.original_text: "Hardly. According to the chronicles of the House, I was born on one of the Orsellio worlds. Virt... Irtvi... Oh, what was it..." {n}Cassia absent-mindedly rubs her temple.{/n} "Please forgive me, Lord Captain, my childhood memories are too vague. Sometimes I dream about the colourful birds that built their nests in the garden. Or the servants dressed in purple livery. Or the blue fog that rolled over the lowlands behind the palace... But everything is covered in a rosy haze. Perhaps it is my imagination, not my memory, that is painting these pictures."

traits.locale_text: "Pek sayılmaz. Hane vakayinamelerinde anlatıldığına göre Orsellio dünyalarından birinde doğmuşum. Dünyanın adı Virt miydi, Irtvi miydi neydi..." {n}Cassia dalgın dalgın şakaklarını ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Lütfen kusura bakma Lord Kaptan, çocukluğuma dair anılarım pek net değil. Bazen rüyalarımda bahçemize yuva yapmış rengârenk kuşları, mor üniformalara bürünmüş hizmetkârları veya sarayın ardındaki ovaları kaplayan masmavi sisi görüyorum... Oysa her şey tozpembe. Belki de bu gördüklerimin kaynağı hafızam değil de hayal gücümdür."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
